app.credits: Made with React and Node.js by {{author}}
app.title: Translation File Generator

fileConfig.availableLanguagesInstructions: Toggle off the language in which you do not want to create a translation file.
fileConfig.filenameInstructions: Type the desired filename. Use "{lang}" for the language code (default: 3 letter code). Toggle the switch below to use the 2 letter code.

fileResults.downloadText: The translation file has been generated.
fileResults.downloadInstruction: The download link will be valid for the next {{time}} minutes.
